title: orca-recovery-adapter Lambda Config
description: The config for the orca-recovery-adapter Lambda.

buckets.description: AWS S3 bucket mapping used for Cumulus and ORCA configuration.

\\S*.description: bucket configuration for the key'd bucket

type.description: the type of bucket - i.e. internal, public, private, protected

fileBucketMaps.description: A list of dictionaries that contains details of the configured storage bucket and file regex.

regex.description: The regex that matches the file extension type

sampleFileName.description: name of a sample file having extension.

bucket.description: The name of the key that points to the correct S3 bucket. Examples include public, private, protected, etc

excludedFileExtensions.description: A list of file extensions to ignore when copying files.

asyncOperationId.description: The unique identifier used for tracking requests. If not present, will be generated.

defaultBucketOverride.description: Overrides the default bucket to copy to in os.environ['ORCA_DEFAULT_BUCKET'].

defaultRecoveryTypeOverride.description: Overrides the default restore type in os.environ['DEFAULT_RECOVERY_TYPE'].
